roleset.name: assign a number to

role.descr: secondary predication on arg, quantified as what

example.name: just transitive
example.text: `` We can not quantify the total adverse effects of Hugo , '' said Edwin Colodny , chairman and president of USAir Group .

propbank.arg: the total adverse effects of Hugo

example.name: args 0 and 1
example.text: Amongst his achievements was his quantification of the unreliability of key longitudinal measurement .

propbank.arg: of the unreliability of key longitudinal measurement

example.name: args 1 and 2
example.text: its quantification as force times the distance over which the force is applied

propbank.arg: as force times the distance over which the force is applied

roleset.note: QUANTIFY-V NOTES: Frames file for 'quantify' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No Verbnet entry, no Framenet entry. Comparison with count, loosely. (from quantify.01-v predicate notes)
QUANTIFICATION-N NOTES: ~quantify.01. Updated by Julia based on more-nouns. (from quantification.01-n)
